[Portrait]Argath
[Dialog]My name is Argath, a knight in His Excellency
the marquis Elmdore de Limberry's household.{END}

[Portrait]Delita
[Dialog]A knight, you say?{END}

Well, truth be told, I am a knight apprentice...
as are you, if I'm not far mistaken.{END}

A fellow knight-in-training, then.
I am <Ramza> Beoulve, and this
is Delita Heiral, my trusted friend.{END}

Beoulve? You're not of the Beoulves
of the Order of the Northern Sky,
are you?
What fantastic luck! A blessing in the
midst of disaster!{END}

What-?{END}

The Order can help me rescue
the marquis! It must!{END}

The marquis is held captive?{END}

They took him hostage, yes,
but he still lives!

We must act quickly if he is
to remain so. Should he be
killed, I will lose everything...{END}

Calm yourself. Who's to say your
marquis is to be killed, anyway?

The Corpse Brigade would not take a
man alive save there were value in
keeping him so. Of that you can be sure.{END}

There's little the three of us
can do to help, in any case.

If the marquis was taken hostage,
Eagrose will be in an uproar. You
can be sure of that, too.{END}

Then before all else we will report in
to Eagrose. Are we agreed?{END}

Agreed. We'll start there.{END}

You simply -must- help me!
Please! I beg you!{END}
